content: Kaadeeshu kaadeeshu kaadeeshu moriyo aaloho hailsono haavu dam/u200blen shmaayo varavo men theshbahose ooshaane bamaraume
/tbreeku deso vose bashmehu dmoriyo aaloho theshoobuhattho bamaraume:

Kaadeeshaathu aaloho
Kaadeeshaathu hailsono
Kaadeeshaathu lomoyooso
Desthlebthu hlophain esraahaamelain /t(moonnu praavashyam)

Moraan esraahaamelain
Moraan hoosu uraahemelain
Moran kaabel theshmeshthaan
Vasalaavosaan vesraahaamelain

Shubaho loku aaloho
Shubaho loku borooyo
Shubaho loku malkkomsheeho dhoyel
Lhaatthoye abdaayku - baarekmor.

Aaboon dbash/u200bmaayo. Nesaadaashu shmoku theese malkoosok. Nehave seb/u200byonoku aykkaano dbashmaayo ophu baravo. Hab/u200blan lahamo d/u200bsunkonaan yaumono. Vashbuk/u200blaan havbain vahatthohain. Aykkaano dophhnaan. Shbakkan lhaayobain. Lo thaalaan lnes/u200byoovno. Elo phaason men beesho. Metthul d/u200bdeeloku hee malkkooso uhailo utheshbuhattho lolaam olmeen. Aameen
